page.title: 09HEALTH IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THE HEALTH CENTRE IS OWNED BY THE SHEFFIELD AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY.VARIOUS ACTIVITIES IN THE HEALTH FIELD ARE CARRIED OUT;NOT ALL CONNECTED DIRECTLY WITH THE GENERAL PRACTITIONERS. SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY. 1. DISTRICT NURSING. THREE NURSES ARE PROVIDED TO SERVE THE WHOLE OF THE STOCKSBRIDGE AREA. 2. CHIROPODY SERVICE. FOOT CARE IS PROVIDED FOR THE PENSIONERS BUT NOT FOR THE REST OF THE COMMUNITY. 3. SPEECH THERAPY. A SPEECH THERAPIST ATTENDS ONCE PER WEEK. 4. HEALTH VISITORS.3 ARE BASED AT THE CENTRE ATTENDING TO PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN. 5. FAMILY PLANNING. THERE IS A CLINIC ONCE EVERY TWO WEEKS.
